title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Germany 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall GDP growth compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

GDP growth compared to previous year is roughly increasing from 2014 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2017, slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2019, gradually increasing from 2019 to 2020, and lastly roughly constant from 2020 to 2024.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 2.47 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 0.54 was reached at Year 2019
